DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare incidence acute kidney injury patient receive perioperative dexmedetomidine placebo undergo valvular heart surgery .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Dexmedetomidine Postoperative Renal Function Valvular Heart Surgery
DOC.criteria: adult patient age 20 schedule valvular heart surgery Left ventricularejection fraction < 30 % Preexisting congestive heart failure Severe coronary artery disease Hemodynamically unstable arrhythmia Cardiogenic shock perioperative period Ventricular assist device Severe renal dysfunction ( eGFR < 15ml/min per 1.73m2 )
